text: The Tucurui Dam is a dam for a hydroelectric power plant in Brazil. It is located in Tucurui province. It has a gravity wall constructed in the 1980s, and is one of the biggest hydroelectric dams in the world. Its constructiion started in the 1980s. It is located on Tocantins River. Category:Dams in South America Category:Buildings and structures in Brazil Category:Pará
title: Tucuruí Dam
